name: jaan-to
description: Give soul to your workflow. 29 AI-powered skills for product management (PRDs, user stories), development (frontend/backend scaffolds, task breakdowns, data models, API contracts, component design), evidence-based repo audits (detect suite: dev, design, writing, product, UX + knowledge pack), UX research synthesis, QA test cases (BDD/Gherkin), and data analytics (GTM tracking). Features two-phase workflow with human approval, quality-reviewer agent, and continuous improvement via LEARN.md system.
